SENT.plain: Under examination there were 12 patients aged from 5 till 14 years
An investigation of hemostatic potential of blood in the diseased extremity and peripheral blood was performed
A mosaic character of blood coagulative alterations in this category of patients was detected

Autotransfusion of UV-irradiated blood is a pathogenetically grounded and accessible method of correction of hemocoagulation and may be included in the complex treatment of patients with dysplasia of the profound veins of lower extremities
